languages.text: "Нас обещали приставить к грузовому составу несколько вахт назад! Нам семьи надо кормить!"

traits.locale_text: "Нас обещали приставить к грузовому составу несколько вахт назад! Нам семьи надо кормить!"

languages.text: "They promised they'd assign us to a freight train several watches ago! We have families to feed!"
languages.original_text: "Нас обещали приставить к грузовому составу несколько вахт назад! Нам семьи надо кормить!"

traits.locale_text: "They promised they'd assign us to a freight train several watches ago! We have families to feed!"
"They promised me they'd assign me to a freight train five watches ago! I have a family to feed!"
"They promised they'd assign me to a freight train five watches ago! I have a family to feed!"
"They promised they'd assign me to a freight train five watches ago! I have a family to feed!"
"They promised they'd assign us to a freight train several watches ago! We have families to feed!"
"They promised they'd assign us to a freight train several watches ago! We have families to feed!"
"They promised they'd assign us to a freight train several watches ago! We have families to feed!"

languages.text: «¡Prometieron que nos asignarían a un tren de mercancías hace varias guardias! ¡Tenemos familias que alimentar!».
languages.original_text: "They promised they'd assign us to a freight train several watches ago! We have families to feed!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Prometieron que nos asignarían a un tren de mercancías hace varias guardias! ¡Tenemos familias que alimentar!».

languages.text: 「彼らは大分前に貨物列車に配置してもらえると約束したんだ！俺らたちには養う家族がいるんだ！」
languages.original_text: "They promised they'd assign us to a freight train several watches ago! We have families to feed!"

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは大分前に貨物列車に配置してもらえると約束したんだ！俺らたちには養う家族がいるんだ！」

languages.text: “他们答应过咱们，本该在五巡之前就把咱们安排到货运列车上！咱们还要养家糊口呢！”
languages.original_text: "They promised they'd assign us to a freight train several watches ago! We have families to feed!"

traits.locale_text: “他们答应过咱们，本该在五巡之前就把咱们安排到货运列车上！咱们还要养家糊口呢！”

languages.text: "Sie haben vor mehreren Schichten versprochen, uns einen Frachtzug zu schicken! Wir müssen unsere Familien ernähren."
languages.original_text: "They promised they'd assign us to a freight train several watches ago! We have families to feed!"

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben vor mehreren Schichten versprochen, uns einen Frachtzug zu schicken! Wir müssen unsere Familien ernähren."

languages.text: « Ça fait plusieurs tours de garde que j'attends qu'on nous affecte à un train de marchandises ! Ils avaient promis ! On a des familles à nourrir ! »
languages.original_text: "They promised they'd assign us to a freight train several watches ago! We have families to feed!"

traits.locale_text: « Ça fait plusieurs tours de garde que j'attends qu'on nous affecte à un train de marchandises ! Ils avaient promis ! On a des familles à nourrir ! »

languages.text: "Kaç vardiya önceden bizi bir yük trenine atayacaklarına söz vermişlerdi. Ekmek götürecek ailelerimiz var bizim!"
languages.original_text: "They promised they'd assign us to a freight train several watches ago! We have families to feed!"
